item.title: Adjustable Counterforce Brace with Cool Gel Compression Pad for Tennis Elbow
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
AT Surgicalâ€™s Adjustable Counterforce Brace with Gel Compression Pad for Tennis Elbow will reduce soreness and minimize the danger of further injury.

Whether suffering from Tennis Elbow (Lateral Epicondylitis), Golf Elbow (Medial Epicondylitis), Forearm Tendonitis, Arthritis, Cubital Tunnel or Ulnar Nerve pain, Carpal Tunnel Syndrome or pain resulting from Arm Hyperextension, our elbow brace has been aiding people with muscle strain for 40 years.

The post Adjustable Counterforce Brace with Cool Gel Compression Pad for Tennis Elbow appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Provides adjustable, stabilizing protection, relief, and compression
  • Adjustable, velcro-backed tendon pad cushions place gentle pressure where & when you need it
  • Fasteners are adjustable for best fit
  • Fits both left and right elbows
  • Gel compression pad can be chilled for additional pain relief & recovery
Forearm Size Brace Size
12.5″ – 15″ Small
15″ – 17″ Medium
17″ – 20.5″ Large

item.title: HotShotz Portable Heating Pad
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Never suffer the pains of cold or soreness again! Introducing HotShotz, the latest addition to the AT Surgical family of products. HotShotz are an incredible new heating pad that eliminates the wait time between needing heat and having it. With HotShotz you will always have a source of heat at the ready whether you need it to reduce stiffness & soreness or keep your hands warm in the long winter months. Instructions: https://youtu.be/6mrCihv7wY4

The post HotShotz Portable Heating Pad appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
• Heats up instantly!
  • Indoors: Great for Massage Therapy, Physical Therapy, Neck Pain, Back Pain, Joints, Sore Muscles, Cramps, Sports injuries, Poor Circulation, Arthritis and more
  • Outdoors: Stay warm while Camping, Hunting, fishing, Hiking, Skiing, Snowboarding, skating, Motorcycling, Sporting Events, Scuba Diving and more
  • Lasts approximately two hours
  • Portable

 

The post HotShotz Portable Heating Pad appeared first on AT Surgical.

item.title: Effective Arthritis And Carpal Tunnel Relief Elbow Thermal Warmer,Elbow And Wrist Support
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
Providing compression therapy and gentle support, this arthritis Elbow thermal warmer are made with a premium cotton-spandex blend that contours to the natural shape of…

The post Effective Arthritis And Carpal Tunnel Relief Elbow Thermal Warmer,Elbow And Wrist Support appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
Providing compression therapy and gentle support, this arthritis Elbow thermal warmer are made with a premium cotton-spandex blend that contours to the natural shape of your hand and allows complete mobility of the fingers and thumb. The lightweight, fingerless compression gloves relieve arthritis pain by reducing stress on painful pressure points while easing aching and stiff muscles, tendons and joints.It is easily perform everyday tasks like using the phone, typing, cooking and more without interference. Lightly textured with a non-slip composite material, the arthritis warmer provide perfect warm up after little injury from sports or cycling . It is Lightweight and breathable, The cotton-spandex material will allow you to wear the gloves comfortably all day long. The blend allows moistures and excess heat to escape while retaining therapeutic heat to soothe hands and knuckles without becoming hot and uncomfortable.

Features:

  • Knee Sleeves Taking Your Performance to the Next Level by using this warmer.
  • Provides the Best Support for Both Men & Women
  • Compression is Proven to Promote Muscle Recovery & Injury Prevention
  • Perfect for Weight Lifting, Cross Training, Powerlifting, Gym and Other Heavy Fitness Workouts
  • 1 Pair of knee sleeves – with 1 year free no-hassle replacement guarantee.
  • A perfect for riding bicycle and Car during fog.
  • The blend allows moistures and excess heat to escape while retaining therapeutic heat to soothe hands and knuckles without becoming hot and uncomfortable.

Specification:

  • Gender: Unisex.
  • Condition:A brand-new, unused, unopened, undamaged item
  • Number of items: 1
  • Product typename:Health_personal_care
  • Package quantity: 1
  • Application:Stroller hand warmer.

    • Sizes

  • Sizes Available
  • S,M,L,XL

item.title: Bernie Pouch With Cold Or Hot Wrap Gel Pack : Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee, Leg, Foot & Ankle Pain Relief
item.dc:creator: delta
item.description:
The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK is an essential product in your First-Aid box for your home. Just fill up with Hot or Cold Gel…

The post Bernie Pouch With Cold Or Hot Wrap Gel Pack : Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee, Leg, Foot & Ankle Pain Relief appeared first on AT Surgical.
item.content:encoded:
The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK is an essential product in your First-Aid box for your home.
Just fill up with Hot or Cold Gel Packs to get relief from sports injuries, swelling, muscle pains, post surgery, recovery after knee replacement, arthritis treatment, Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee,Leg,Foot & Ankle joint pain relief and more!

Features:

  • Universal use : The AT Bernie Pouch can be used universally for all your body pain relief for example on shoulder, arm, back, knee and leg.
  • Accommodates both Hot and Cold Gel Packs- The bernie pouch can be used both for Cold and Hot Gel Packs. So it lets you use it as an ice pack or heating pad. The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK comes with a HOT/COLD pack according to your choice.
  • Reusable – The Bernie Pouch is reusable. Fill up the bernie pouch with Hot or Cold Gel Packs as desired, use it for your Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee,Leg.Foot & Ankle joint pain relief. The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK comes with a HOT/COLD pack according to your choice.After use, dispose off the Hot or Cold Gel Pack, wash the Bernie Pouch and reuse by refilling new HOT/COLD pack; as simple as that ; thus it is both washable & economical.
  • One Size Fits All: The Bernie Pouch is unlike other cheap leg or foot wraps that are too tight. Cheap leg/feet wraps make it discomfortable for your feet and ankles whereas The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK is a one size fits all product that allows you to enjoy the perfect support while treating your aching feet, shoulders, arms, back, knees, ankle, you name it !
  • COOL OR HEAT RELIEF FOR ACHING FEET AND ANKLES: The Bernie Pouch gives you the choice to either use Cold/Hot Gel Packs, providing you the choice of therapy that best suits your needs and treat Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee,Leg,Foot & Ankle joint soreness effectively. The 46-A Bernie Pouch W/HOT/COLD PACK comes with a HOT/COLD pack according to your choice.
  • Easy to Use :This easy to use Bernie Pouch is ideal to relieve pain caused by injuries, sprains, arthritis and more! Fill up the Bernie Pouch with Hot or Cold gels and simply put your foot into it and enjoy the comfort, allowing the hot or cold gel packs to relieve any existing pain.

Size

  • Size Available
  • One Size Fits All

    • The post Bernie Pouch With Cold Or Hot Wrap Gel Pack : Shoulder, Arm, Back, Knee, Leg, Foot & Ankle Pain Relief appeared first on AT Surgical.
